title: Appreciation of one’s own life circle not to be interrupted by the speeding desire of a yesterday of...

attachments.displayName:
Appreciation of one’s own life circle not to be interrupted by the speeding desire of a yesterday of how the past use to live their life can succumb you to trading in your new life, if not ready! Most people are aware of their personal victory as to be sadden by those who wish not to see the massive development of a new person in a physical realm where their old habits override or rotten them outside or in. When help is received as to the admiration of self and as others witness that they are causing their own downfall not you! Then victimized begins, which commonly will lead to low self-esteem thus the control factor begins! As witnessing the rise of someone own being called upon to taking a lead in their own life style can rupture a time call dependency! That dependency can be in areas of drugs, sex, money or all 3! Those who have seen the victory of others, now see that others can see that they have an dependency! So who is really undercover?
We all have one or two or more in our families, but why gang up on the one who kept his eyes on the prize! Not forgetting the struggle by reaching for a star! This is not to offend ,however let’s not pretend that they don’t see the maturity and respect pride and dignity that you have for Self as others on the street try to intercede* Being protective is one thing as to witnessing that these people still live and love the game. But what happens when their child /children no longer want that for themselves feeling insulted or ashamed! As some have gone threw this irony , now the time of releasing one from this addiction , as love is still given to family , however not again to interrupt a health , or a career!
Standing strong is good but know that you are not alone. INTEGRITY (RESPECT PRIDE & DIGNITY)
Hold your head up and still love but love yourself enough to continue if it’s worth and value can equal to MORALS.
Don’t let stubbornness nest in your head, remember your heart will follow. This which can lead to depression and sorrow.
And denial can lead to a dependency.

object.content:
Appreciation of one’s own life circle not to be interrupted by the speeding desire of a yesterday of how the past use to live their life can succumb you to trading in your new life, if not ready! Most people are aware of their personal victory as to be sadden by those who wish not to see the massive development of a new person in a physical realm where their old habits override or rotten them outside or in. When help is received as to the admiration of self and as others witness that they are causing their own downfall not you! Then victimized begins, which commonly will lead to low self-esteem thus the control factor begins! As witnessing the rise of someone own being called upon to taking a lead in their own life style can rupture a time call dependency! That dependency can be in areas of drugs, sex, money or all 3! Those who have seen the victory of others, now see that others can see that they have an dependency! So who is really undercover? 
We all have one or two or more in our families, but why gang up on the one who kept his eyes on the prize! Not forgetting the struggle by reaching for a star! This is not to offend ,however let’s not pretend that they don’t see the maturity and respect pride and dignity that you have for Self as others on the street try to intercede* Being protective is one thing as to witnessing that these people still live and love the game. But what happens when their child /children no longer want that for themselves feeling insulted or ashamed! As some have gone threw this irony , now the time of releasing one from this addiction , as love is still given to family , however not again to interrupt a health , or a career!
Standing strong is good but know that you are not alone. INTEGRITY (RESPECT PRIDE & DIGNITY)
Hold your head up and still love but love yourself enough to continue if it’s worth and value can equal to MORALS.
Don’t let stubbornness nest in your head, remember your heart will follow. This which can lead to depression and sorrow.
And denial can lead to a dependency.
